Description: Funerary papyri containing First Book of Breathing (incomplete version) written in hieratic script. Text on recto and verso.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Herbin, F.-R., Books of Breathing and Related Texts (Catalogue of the Books of the Dead and Other Related Texts in the British Museum IV), London, 2008, pp. 88-89, pls. 55-56.
Bibliographic references: Herbin 2008 / Books of Breathing and Related Texts (pp.87-89, pls.53-56) (relates to EA 71513B and EA 71513C)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57960) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57960)
